title: Croatia Producer Prices
description: Producer Prices in Croatia increased to 132.50 points in October from 131 points in September of 2022. Producer Prices in Croatia averaged 102.92 points from 2013 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 132.50 points in October of 2022 and a record low of 94.80 points in August of 2016. In Croatia, the Producer Price Index measures the average change in price of goods and services sold by manufacturers and producers in the wholesale market during a given period. This page provides - Croatia Producer Prices - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Croatian Bureau of Statistics
